chunks.zh: 地铁短视频外放的人都什么心态
chunks.en: What is the mentality of people who play short videos out loud on the subway

chunks.zh: 每次早晚上下班做地铁，尤其是早上，遇到地铁上短视频外放的人真是头大，，恨不得要全车厢都听到他（她）在看什么（多数都是电影解说或新闻点评）。不幸身边就是外放的话，，只能站起来远离。。现在耳机几十块的都够用哇
chunks.en: Every time I take the subway to and from work, especially in the morning, I get a headache when I encounter people playing short videos out loud on the subway. I wish the whole carriage could hear what he (or she) is watching (mostly movie commentaries or news reviews). If it's playing out loud next to me, I can only stand up and move away. Nowadays, even headphones that cost a few dozen yuan are good enough

chunks.zh: 如果声音很大，你直接告诉他降低音量，就行不要现场唯唯诺诺，网上重拳蛐蛐
chunks.en: If the sound is loud, tell them directly to lower the volume. Don't be a yes-man on the spot, but be tough online

chunks.zh: 我国国民素质平均下来最大的问题就是，从来不考虑自身对他人造成的影响不管国内国外，各种行为的都极其的离谱
chunks.en: The biggest problem with the average quality of our citizens is that they never consider the impact they have on others, regardless of whether they are domestic or foreign, and their various behaviors are extremely outrageous

chunks.zh: 声音还能戴耳机挡一下，走路上抽烟的才是真烦
chunks.en: You can block the sound with headphones, but smokers on the road are really annoying

chunks.zh: 来这吐槽有啥用，我坐地铁遇到有人放的就直接大声怒吼了，而且如果不停我还会骂脏话，大不了打一架。
chunks.en: What's the use of complaining here? When I encounter someone playing it on the subway, I just shout loudly, and if they don't stop, I'll swear, and at worst, I'll fight.

chunks.zh: 没素质但不太影响我，我倒是不太理解为什么要开那么大声公放，我看什么都会静音，因为觉得被人听到我在看什相当于暴露隐私
chunks.en: It's not polite but it doesn't really affect me. I don't understand why people would play it so loudly. I mute everything I watch because I feel like people hearing what I'm watching is like exposing my privacy

chunks.zh: 苹果的话买个弹框器对付，安卓就没办法了
chunks.en: If you have an iPhone, you can buy a pop-up blocker to deal with it, but there's no way for Android

chunks.zh: 地铁最多忍两站，高铁呢？大人、小孩儿外放看电视，打游戏，刷抖音...
chunks.en: You can tolerate the subway for at most two stops, but what about the high-speed rail? Adults and children playing TV shows out loud, playing games, scrolling through Douyin...

chunks.zh: 我在杭州地铁很少遇到外放大声的，因为经常有巡检员走来走去 他看到有人放声了 就过去劝阻了
chunks.en: I rarely encounter people playing videos loudly on the Hangzhou subway because there are often inspectors walking around. When they see someone playing it out loud, they go over to dissuade them

chunks.zh: @Hiok #6 我都上去直接说请你不要开外放（语气是非常强硬的那种）。我 200 多斤，一般人看到我这个体格子直接就关掉声音了。遇到有中年大哥极不情愿不想关的，直接一个眼神，那种今天你不关这个声音，我今天就让你连人带手机一块儿撂在这儿的气势。基本上到这就能搞定了。如果到这一步还不能搞定，我想只能直接开骂了。反正不能先动手))动手了也不怕
chunks.en: @Hiok #6 I'll go up and say directly, please don't play it out loud (in a very strong tone). I weigh over 200 pounds, and most people will turn off the sound when they see my physique. If I meet a middle-aged man who is reluctant to turn it off, I'll give him a direct look, the kind of look that says, if you don't turn off the sound today, I'll make you leave your phone and yourself here today. Basically, it can be solved at this point. If it still can't be solved after this, I think I can only start swearing. Anyway, I can't be the first to start a fight. I'm not afraid to fight.

chunks.zh: 赛博漏阴癖
chunks.en: Cyber exhibitionism

chunks.zh: 我见一个，教训一个，现在录的视频都有三个了。我准备到年底看看能收集多少个这种素材，来个没素质行为大混剪
chunks.en: I've seen one, and I've educated one. I have three videos recorded now. I plan to see how much material of this kind I can collect by the end of the year and make a big mix-cut of uncivilized behavior.

chunks.zh: 除了愤怒，别无他法，该死的的字节跳动。
chunks.en: Besides anger, there's nothing else I can do, damn ByteDance.

chunks.zh: 问素质低的人是什么“心态”是没意义的，素质低就是素质低，并不是说 ta 内心中有一种理性思维让 ta 素质低，就像你并不会问熊孩子淘气或者精神病人犯病是什么“心态”一样
chunks.en: It's meaningless to ask what the ;;'mentality' of a person with low quality is, low quality is just low quality, it's not that there's a kind of rational thinking in their mind that makes their quality low, just like you wouldn't ask what the 'mentality' of a mischievous child or a mentally ill person is

chunks.zh: 没素质罢了🤣
chunks.en: It's just a lack of quality🤣

chunks.zh: @x86 esp32 是吧哈哈哈
chunks.en: @x86 esp32 right hahaha

chunks.zh: 经济发展太快，素质跟不上 。
chunks.en: The economy is developing too fast, and quality can't keep up.

chunks.zh: @chen1210 怒忍二十分钟下车哈哈，，
chunks.en: @chen1210 Endured it for twenty minutes and got off the train haha

chunks.zh: @raydied 高铁可就折磨人了，小盆友更麻烦
chunks.en: @raydied High-speed rail is really torturous, and it's even more troublesome with kids

chunks.zh: @Hiok #6 一怒之下怒了一下
chunks.en: @Hiok #6 Got angry and expressed my anger

chunks.zh: 我底线比较低,你外放我都可以将就,但是如果是中又赢责美石脚 003 航母这种听了就让我脸红的题材我就得换车厢了
chunks.en: My bottom line is relatively low, and I can tolerate you playing out loud, but if it's a topic like 'China wins again, criticizing America, the stone feet 003 aircraft carrier' that makes me blush, I'll have to change carriages
